title: NEXUS Criteria for C-Spine Imaging
desc: The NEXUS Criteria for C-spine Imaging clears patients from cervical spine fracture clinically, without imaging.

data.evidence:
One easy mnemonic for these criteria is NSAID:

  • Neuro Deficit.
  • Spinal Tenderness (Midline).
  • Altered Mental Status/Level of Consciousness.
  • Intoxication.
  • Distracting Injury.
